name: ROVI Protocol
description: ROVI Network is a Web3 powerhouse building infrastructure and platforms to bring Crypto to the daily lives of billions of users in the simplest ways, through the $ROVI token at the heart of the ecosystem. Think of ROVI network as "WeChat Pay+Mini-Apps" but for Crypto! With built-in critical infrastructure elements like keyless wallet, gasless transactions and 1-click on/off ramp for mass-user onboarding. We offer AI smart keyboard app (which allows us to ride over your existing messaging + a Crypto super app for utilities)
